body_html: Hmm, not sure. It's relatively new, so I'd be reluctant to add it unless there have been some other papers that used it. Also, we should at least make it icnr to match the conventions used in other methods. I'll leave the decision up to @soumith
body_text: Hmm, not sure. It's relatively new, so I'd be reluctant to add it unless there have been some other papers that used it. Also, we should at least make it icnr to match the conventions used in other methods. I'll leave the decision up to @soumith
body: Hmm, not sure. It's relatively new, so I'd be reluctant to add it unless there have been some other papers that used it. Also, we should at least make it `icnr` to match the conventions used in other methods. I'll leave the decision up to @soumith
